flawed_nl_solution:
The total percentage the class needs to get is 18.75 because 25 x 0.75 = <<25*0.75=18.75>>18.75
The total percentage the class has absent the one student is <<1.85=1.85>>1.85
The lowest the absent student can get and still have a pizza party is 27% because (18.75-1.85)x 100 = <<(18.75-1.85)*100=1690.2>>1690.2
#### 1690.2
